DEV_MODE.description: activates console logs, tracking in test project

general_app_data.description: The version and release date of the application, displayed in options.

general_app_name.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

general_app_short_name.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

general_app_description.message: This addon inserts templates easily into textfields. It supports autofill, quickfill, sharing and many more.
general_app_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

general_context_menu_supporter.description: Supporters link text in context menu

browser_ui_contextmenu_edit_templates.description: A menulink in contextmenu when right-clicking the icon.

html_title_of_created_dropdown.description: A dropdown menu to inject templates can be created, this is the value of the html tag

options_table_headline_open_all_button.description: toggle link, opens / closes all template configs

configure_input_template_description_def.description: default value if none is set

options_table_th_displayName.description: header for project specific templates display name

configure_input_template_name_default_va.description: default value if none is set

configure_input_template_type.description: Issue Type the template is for

configure_input_projects.description: Project names for autofill functionality. ABC, DEF or default for every project

advanced_options_section2_options_headli.description: label for adding new types to dropdown

advanced_options_section2_explanation_au.message: The issue description will be prefilled with your template. (JIRA only)

advanced_options_section2_explanation_qu.message: You can insert templates using a dropdown menu and buttons. Those will be applied to the WYSIWYG editor (JIRA only)

advanced_options_section2_explanation_co.message: You can insert your templates using the rightclick menu. (works with every tool)

advanced_options_section2_explanation_ke.message: When inserting a template in a text field, you can either overwrite it or keep the previous text.

COMMENT4_2.message: ADVANCED OPTIONS / TEXT INPUTS and RESET BUTTON

advanced_options_section2_explanation_se.message: This text will separate the inserted template from the previous content.
To use your templates you have to provide at least one valid domain. Separate more than one domains with a comma e.g. 'jira.mycompany.com, mycompany.trello.net'

advanced_options_button_export_configjso.description: button for generate and download json file

advanced_options_explanation_export_temp.message: Click the button to backup or share your templates.

advanced_options_button_import_configjso.description: button for import and download json file

advanced_options_explanation_import_temp.message: Do you want to get templates from an exported file? Use the 'merge' method to keep your existing templates and add the new ones or use 'overwrite' to replace all your templates.
Get new or sync your current templates using a URL. (Make sure just text is visible if you open your URL. Otherwise it might not work.)
advanced_options_explanation_import_temp.messageAfterRelease: Merge / Overwrite your current templates using a URL.
advanced_options_explanation_import_temp.description: explanation for using the url in import

advanced_options_explanation_import_temp.message: My buy me a coffee page

advanced_options_explanation_rate_and_do.message: I developed Templates for JIRA based on user's needs and for further improvements your feedback is very welcome. If you have a feature idea, or find my app useful consider supporting me by using the buttons below. I would greatly appreciate your effort :)
advanced_options_explanation_rate_and_do.description: label ask for rating and donation

advanced_options_section4_calc_timesaved.message:
*The following assumptions have been made:
  1. your typing speed is equal to the average typing speed of an semi professional typer (300 chars per minute)
  2. you know exactly what to type
  3. you don't make any mistakes (i have made 4 while typing this list :))

alert_message_confirm_action_delete.message:
This process can not be undone.
Do you want to delete this entry, click Ok.

alert_message_confirm_action_reset.message:
This process can not be undone.
Do you want to reset the app to it's initial state, click Ok.

alert_message_confirm_action_import_over.message:
This process can not be undone.
Do you want to overwrite all your settings and templates, click Ok.

alert_message_confirm_action_import_merg.message: This action will add new templates and configs to your existing ones. Do you want to proceed, click Ok.

alert_message_action_import_failed.message: Something went wrong! Please try another import file.

alert_message_action_fetch_file_from_url.message: Something went wrong! Please assure that your URL looks like 'https://www.mycompany.com/files/templates.json' and you can see some data when open it in your browser window.
alert_message_action_fetch_file_from_url.description: message that file could not retrieved
